title: Rek'Sai Original Skin
body:
So I saw this on the League of Legends wiki and must ask:

CAN WE PLEASE GET THIS AS A SKIN?

Reaver Rek'Sai or Traditional Rek'Sai

replies.body: I saw this on the wiki too. I agree it should be a skin.

I'd rather have Clown Rek'Sai that has a creepy clown laugh when she ults and squeaky noise every time she attacks. The tunnels are carnival clown door thingies. You get the idea. Rito, make it happen!
